content: this is a summary of a legal case in telšiai district court the case involves two parties referred to as the applicant and the defendant the applicant requested the division of property inherited after the death of a person referred to as t the court found that the property should be divided between the parties based on the principles of fairness and proportionality the court also addressed the payment of utility bills and other expenses related to the inherited property the court ordered the defendant to pay the applicant for their share of the expenses the court also discussed the burial costs of the deceased and determined that the applicant should be reimbursed for their share of the expenses the court concluded that the inherited property should be divided between the parties the defendant filed a counterclaim but the court dismissed it the court ordered the defendant to pay the costs of the proceedings and a stamp duty the court also divided the property between the parties awarding the applicant an apartment and the defendant a vehicle the applicant was ordered to pay the defendant for the maintenance of the property the defendant was ordered to hand over the keys to the apartment finally the defendant was ordered to pay the applicant for the costs of the proceedings and the stamp duty

metadata.cost: 31.00 EUR (stamp duty) + 1'201.50 EUR (professional fees) to be borne by the defendant
